detail.lastUpdated: {{ subject.givenName }}'s assessment was last updated on {{ lastUpdatedDate }}.

linkedToHarm.no: This area is not linked to RoSH (risk of serious harm)

linkedtoReoffending.no: This area is not linked to risk of reoffending

detail.motivationToMakeChanges: Motivation to make changes in this area

strengthsOrProtectiveFactors.yes: There are strengths or protective factors related to this area
strengthsOrProtectiveFactors.no: There are no strengths or protective factors related to this area

withoutScoring.sectionParagraph: Health and wellbeing, and finances never have a need score. When other information is available for those areas, you can see it here.

incompleteAssessment.errorDescription: This means the areas have not been marked as complete in the assessment, but you can still see the latest information available.
incompleteAssessment.sectionParagraph: These areas have not been marked as complete in the assessment yet, but you can see the latest information available.

needScore.doesNotHaveNeedScore: This area never has a need score
